# [Interview #1167: Lisbon, Portugal, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1167#1)

#### Question

In the books, the Hoid we see is always the same physical being?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes! It's the same physical entity.
